org.apache.beam.it.gcp.artifacts.matchers

Class ArtifactsSubject

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.common.truth.Subject
      • org.apache.beam.it.gcp.artifacts.matchers.ArtifactsSubject

  • public final class ArtifactsSubject
extends com.google.common.truth.Subject
    Subject that has assertion operations for artifact lists (GCS files), usually coming from the result of a template.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class com.google.common.truth.Subject
